column2:
Given the problems with PPP, American taxpayers must know if the money is going where Congress intended—the truly small and unbanked businesses

The Trump admin’s resistance to transparency is outrageous and only further raises suspicions about how the funds are being distributed

WATCH: I got tested for #COVID19 because many cases are asymptomatic, and getting tested gives me peace of mind that I won’t spread the virus to others. I encourage all WVians to get tested. Visit my website at https://t.co/q60imzLS21 to find testing events and locations near you https://t.co/hwg2x5qwwT
